actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to provide tax incentives to encourage physicians, dentists, and optometrists to practice in physician shortage areas.

summary.text: Allows an exclusion from adjusted gross income under the Internal Revenue Code of up to $57,500 over a five-year period to doctors, dentists, and optometrists who practice continuously for at least two years (but only $35,000 is excludible for the first two years) in a physician-shortage area.

titles.title: A bill to provide tax incentives to encourage physicians, dentists, and optometrists to practice in physician shortage areas.
